Join ASA!
HEA Reauthorization Webex
National FFELP guarantor American Student Assistance® has designed a HEA Reauthorization update via Webex.
Dates and Time:
Friday 8/15/2008 2:00 p.m. - 3:30 p.m. ET Tuesday 8/19/2008 11:00 a.m. - 12:30 p.m. ET
Course Description:
A quick first glimpse of some of the changes drafted into the Higher Education Act Reauthorization Bill. We will review Higher Education Opportunity Act of 2008 (HR 4137) as passed by both the House and the Senate and which now awaits the Presidents signature. While it's early in the game to discuss details and implementation, this session can give you a head start on knowing what to expect.
Who Should Attend: Any financial aid administrator interested in the most up to date information.
How to register or for additional information:
· Register Online at http://www.amsa.com/fap/training · Email: send your name, phone number and enrollment details to training@amsa.com · Phone: call the Training Department at (800) 999-9080, ext. 3099
All of ASA's training events are offered free of charge. Training is considered one of the guarantor's core responsibilities and ASA is dedicated to providing informative and useful training events for our industry colleagues.
Questions If you have any questions, please contact the Training Department, your client manager, or ASA’s Call Center at (800) 999-9080 and select Option 1. The Call Center’s normal hours of operation are Monday through Friday from 8:30 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. ET.
Meeting specifics, including the conference call telephone number and WebEx online meeting instructions will be sent in a confirmation email 24hours prior to the session.
For technical requirements for the WebEx online meeting: http://support.webex.com/support/system-requirements.html?_nfpb=true&_pageLabel=SystemRequirementsHome
